summary: Gena is a hacker by heart and soul. He's a good fella. But he got himself in some real troubles. And the only thing that can save him - is a thousand years old Djinni, who attempts to learn how to live in the modern world.
cast: Vladimir Tolokonnikov|Marius Jampolskis|Liva Kruminya|Mark Geykhman|Yuliya Paranova|Mila Lipner|Grigoriy Skryapnik|Ivan Gubanov|Aleksandr Ovchinnikov|Yuriy Dumchev|Konstantin Spasskiy|Rostislav Krokhin|Boris Shcherbakov|Sambel Asatryan|Nikolai Dobrokhotov|A. Dubrovsky|Anton Eldarov|Polina Ganshina|M. Karmadonova|Nikolay Kochura|Konstantin Kutarov|E. Ozhigina|Svetlana Pavlova|O. Poplavsky|Dmitry Puchkov|Mikhail Rubtsov|Aleksandr Seleznyov|Pavel Sirotin|Mila Soldatkina|Anton Syomkin|Dmitriy Talantsev|Maksim Vazhov|O. Vlasova|Yelena Volkova|Veronika Voznyak|A. Yepaneshnikov|M. Zharov|V. Zubarev
title: Khottabych
